name: Piscirazzi: Fish Photo Shooter
description:
Take Dazzling Photos


Embark on an underwater photography challenge, where every round you must take the perfect shot with a limited number of photos. Succeed, and you'll get to choose a camera upgrade for future shots. Fail, and it's game over.

Improve Your Abilities


After each round you can review your best photo to see the value of the fish you captured. Use these insights to improve your future shots.

Snap Them All


Understand the unique habits of each species and where to find them and you'll soon be able to snap them all! But don't worry, the depths of the ocean hold no danger for an experienced diver like you. Every dive in Piscirazzi is a new journey full of wonder and discovery!
